#1

Notes:

- There are minor texture glitches (emulator bug).

Install:

Download the latest Pcsx2 nightly build (v1.7.2404 +).

Extract the folder to the pcsx2 texture folder (...\Pcsx2\textures\SLUS-21596\replacements). SSD recommended!!

Config > Graphics Settings > Advanced tab:

Load Texture: ON / Async Texture Loading: ON

Have fun!

Download: https://www.mediafire.com/file_premium/jx6sb4efw9bf31q/SLUS-21596.7z/file

-----

Credits:

Panda Venom

If you want to support me, please buy me a coffe! https://ko-fi.com/pandavenom

Programs used: Cupscale - ESRGAN, Waifu-caffe, Adobe Photoshop

Last edited by Panda_Venom, May 10, 2023

- Added many new textures
